definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: The gokagai of Kyoto are its five geisha districts, also known as hanamachi ("flower towns").
sentences.chinese: 京都的五花街是五大藝妓聚集區，也已花街聞名。

sentences.english: The gokagai of Kyoto are its five geisha districts, also known as hanamachi ("flower towns").
sentences.chinese: 京都的五花街是五大藝妓聚集區，也已花街聞名。

sentences.english: In modern Japan, geisha and maiko are now a rare sight outside hanamachi.
sentences.chinese: 日本現代，在花街之外是很難見到藝妓和舞妓的。
但是，你知道“逛花街”的來歷嗎？

sentences.english: At that time the name of the Revolutionary Committee of the flow Huajie .
sentences.chinese: 當時的名稱是流花街革命委員會。

sentences.english: I remembered the street fair and the fire cracker days during my childhood years in China.
sentences.chinese: 我小時候也過過那種上花街和放鞭炮的日子。

definition: side street/road branching from the main street
